SourceString": Preparations for Grand Titus' departure are underway at Port Town Lendor.\nIt seems that Travel Concierge has been sent a special request regarding departure.\nLet's go to Travel Concierge.

At Port Town Lendor, the Grand Titus is preparing to depart.
{PC} has fulfilled a special request from Travel Concierge and obtained a boarding pass voucher.
South I think you should give it to
Director Sugimu at the Ship Control Bureau in Port Lendor.

{PC} asked Director Sugimu at the Ship Management Office in South Port Lendor to exchange the boarding pass voucher and Red Snapper Tass boarding pass. Sage Hollow has been completed. Deliver the Magic Compass.\nWe're finally ready to leave.\nLet's board the Grand Titus to meet the brave princess of Gran Zedora Kingdom.

{PC} boarded the Grand Titus docked at South Port Lendor.
They saw a man named Doug trying to sell a young man a high price for a boarding ticket.
The young man was strange. After purchasing it at a low price,
Grand Titus set sail for Rendersia as the people saw him off.

On board the Grand Titus, the {PCs} come across\nan incident where the Magic Compass disappears, but thanks to the mysterious powers of a young man named Claws, someone who knows the whereabouts of the Magic Compass is discovered. \nThe red-haired sailor who was the first to leave the wheelhouse seems to have headed for the first deck.

The sailor who stole the Magic Compass was actually a demon familiar to Netherlord Nergel, but thanks to the efforts of Claws, the Magic Compass was safely recovered.
Grand Titus heads towards the Mist of Lost. 
We have resumed sailing.
If you would like to rest until we arrive at Gran Zedora Kingdom, please speak to the cabin attendant at the counter on the first floor.

Continuing sailing toward the Gran Zedora Kingdom on the continent of Rendersia,
Grand Titus passed through the fog of confusion,
but due to the strong current, they decided to anchor at Cocolata Beach, which is different from the kingdom's port.
 
It seems the only way to reach Gran Zedora Kingdom is by land.

Continuing sailing towards the Gran Zedora Kingdom on the continent of Rendersia,\nGrand Titus passed through the fog of confusion, but due to strong currents, they decided to anchor at Cocolata Beach, which is different from the kingdom's port. \nIt seems the only way to reach Gran Zedora Kingdom is by land.

{PC} headed for Gran Zedora Kingdom from Cocolata Beach, but found that the gate leading to Gran Zedora at the Sanmon Gate was closed.
P. Claws told me that if you want to cross the gate
find the three butterflies in Melsandy Village Town of Celed
Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro and come back here!

{PC} visited Melsandy Village
Town of Celed Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro
and collected three items related to butterflies.
According to Claws, having them will open the gate to
LMP Zedora. 
Let's go to the Sanmon Checkpoint.

I collected three items related to butterflies.
I headed for the gate to Gu LMP Zedora at the Sanmon Gate, but I was blocked by the gatekeeper.
When I handed the three butterflies to Claws,
Mishua was there. P. For some reason, we were allowed to pass. 
The PCs were able to take advantage of it and head to Gran Zedora Kingdom.

I collected three items related to butterflies.
I headed for the gate to Gu LMP Zedora at the Sanmon Gate, but I was blocked by the gatekeeper.
When I handed the three butterflies to Claws,
Mishua was there. P. For some reason, we were allowed to pass. 
The PCs were able to take advantage of it and head to Gran Zedora Kingdom.

When I handed the three butterflies to Claws,
Mishua was there. P. For some reason, we were allowed to pass. 
The PCs were able to take advantage of it and head to Gran Zedora Kingdom.

Grand Titus was sailing between Port Town Lendor and Cocolata Beach, but thanks to Sage Hollow's new Magic Compass, she was able to reach Gran Zedora Kingdom.\nWith this, she was able to reach Gran Zedora Kingdom. The sea route connecting Gran Zedora Kingdom and Port Town Lendor has been restored.
We arrived at Melsandy Village.

While searching for three butterflies, {PC} arrived at
Melsandy Village.
At the village entrance, they met a village girl named Mishua and
a boy named Raska, who welcomed them, but
the young man guarding the gate. He was suspected of being a monster's minion. 
It seems something is happening in the village. 
Let's go to the village chief's house.

When you visit the village chief's house, Chief Gash and his son Raska are fighting over Zankrone, the hero who once saved the village.
It seems the village is being attacked by a mysterious monster.
 nThere is news that Villager is missing.
The {PC} is worried about his mother.
Gash asks him to go to Merune Watermill Village, northwest of the village, to pick up his mother.

When you visit the village chief's house, Chief Gash and his son Raska are fighting over Zankrone, the hero who once saved the village.
It seems the village is being attacked by a mysterious monster.
 nThere is news that Villager is missing.
The {PC} is worried about his mother.
Gash asks him to go to Merune Watermill Village, northwest of the village, to pick up his mother.

He was comforting a crying Raska.\nHe went to MeRune watermill town with Mishua, a village girl, {PC}.\nKope, the mother of Chief Gash, who lives in the watermill, was persuaded by Mishua. They agreed to return to the village, but before that, {PC} and Mishua had to repair the watermill.

When I went to repair the watermill,
two rabbit monsters shoved
Man o' War into the gears of the waterwheel.
When the rabbit monsters looked at {PC},
A Man o' War ran away and happily returned to the river.

At Mishua's suggestion, the {PCs} and others worked together to
clean up the stream.
Mishua reveals that she has lost
her memories of before she came to the village, and continues
living in Melsandy Village. 
There, Man o' War gave me a 
Bright Red Gem as a thank you for my help, but 
Let's take Kope back to Melsandy Village.

When I returned to Melsandy Village with Kope,
Chief Gash greeted me.
Gash is not impressed by Kope, but
he has set up a VIP room at the village's Inn for {PC}. 
Kope said he changed his mind when he saw his grandson's face.
He gave me the Bright Red Gem for free. 
Let's stay at the Inn and get some rest.

{PC} was asleep in the village inn's VIP room prepared by the village chief.
Suddenly, a scream was heard from outside.
When {PC} came outside, he saw a monster. 
I saw someone from the Villager being dragged away. 
Let's hurry to Komorebi Square, where the monster is probably heading.

When I rushed to Komorebi Square,
the monster from earlier was about to drag the Villager who had been kidnapped
into a well.
Raska appeared and announced that
Mishua had been kidnapped, and jumped into the well. 
Chief Gash will collapse after leaving Raska and Mishua to
{PC}. 
Let's go into the Inside Well.

When I rushed to Komorebi Plaza,
the monster from earlier was about to drag the Villager that it had kidnapped
into a well.
Raska appeared and announced that
Mishua had been kidnapped, and jumped into the well. 
Chief Gash will collapse after leaving Raska and Mishua to
{PC}. 
Let's go into the Inside Well.

In pursuit of the monster that kidnapped Mishua
I reached the deepest part of the Underground Waterway
{PC}.
There, the Right Incubus holding Mishua was confronting Raska.
{PC} fought alongside Raska against the Right Incubus, but lost.

{PC} and Raska defeat the Right Incubus, but then suddenly the Left Incubus appears.
At that moment of desperation, Raska shouts
the name of the village hero Zankrone.
Bright Red The Gem turned into Zankrone and defeated the Nightmare Hands in an instant.
Mishua went away and returned to the village with Raska.

At the chief's house in Melsandy Village, Raska was happily telling Chief Gash about Zankrone's exploits.
Then, from a back room, a girl he had never met called herself Mishua.
 To thank P. Re
{PC} for his help, he gave her a butterfly ornament.
We arrived at Celed Town.

On their way to find the three butterflies, {PC} arrived at
the town of Cered, a town of only children.
In the Town of Celed, there is a girl with a Famililar at her side.
She is called the Queen.
 nHer notices {PC}'s presence and tells him to come to the town's High Church,
as an adult must be vetted before he can spend time in the town.

{PC} visited the High Church, but
the children of the town, who hate adults,
would not let him meet the girl they call the Queen.
He was ordered to undergo an examination first.
Celedot It seems that you can clear the exam by delivering the dragon's tail, which is sometimes obtained by defeating Bator Rex in Mountain Pass, to Bosch in front of the High Church.

{PC} visited the High Church, but
the children of the town, who hate adults,
would not let him meet the girl they call the Queen.
He was ordered to undergo an examination first.
Celedot I defeated Bator Rex in Mountain Pass and got the dragon's tail, so let's take it to Bosch in front of the High Church.

In order to be recognized by the children
I passed the examination {PC}.
A boy named Bosch, who works as a guard, told me that he would let me enter the High Church.
I would like to meet the girl who is called Queen. I was encouraged to do so.

Lieselotte, the girl known as Queen, recognizes {PC} as an honorary child, explains some of the town rules, and then leaves with the children to the A tea room on the second floor of the church. \nIt looks like it's time for a snack,\nbut it seems like there isn't enough for {PC}...

When they visited the tea room on the second floor of the Church,
Lieselotte and the children were eating the snacks that Famililar had
 magically brought out for them.
A boy named Firo was waiting for the adults
to return. It seems that she wants to do this, but no one agrees.
Lieselotte returns to her room to put her plan into action.

{PC} visited Lieselotte's room and asked her why there were no adults in this town.
The children who used the High Church as their playground
One day, they tried their hand at forbidden summoning. 
It is said that he summoned Famililar's Muccino.
And when he tried to summon the demon that Famililar taught him, the summoning failed.
It seems that the adults were wiped out.

Lieselotte is trying to summon a demon again.
Lieselotte heads to Rinja's Tower to obtain the amber jewel she will use in the ritual.
Firo asks her to come with her to stop Lieselotte.
 I was asked. 
The location of the tower seems to be after going north through the Linjahar Coast ruins.

Lieselotte is trying to summon a demon again.
Lieselotte heads to Rinja Tower to obtain the amber jewel that she will use in the ritual.
Firo asks her to come with her to stop Lieselotte.
 I was asked.
The location of the tower seems to be after going north through the ruins of the Linjahar Coast.

Lieselotte is once again trying to summon a demon.
Lieselotte heads to Rinja Tower to obtain
the amber jewel that will be used in the ritual.
{PC} takes Firo to
Rinja Tower. 
Firo is worried about going against the teachings of his father, who was a priest
, but he must go inside the tower to stop Lieselotte.

Lieselotte is trying to summon a demon again.
Lieselotte heads to Rinja's Tower to obtain
the amber jewel she will use in the ritual.
{PC} takes Firo to
Rinja's Tower. 
Firo is worried about going against the teachings of his father, who was a priest
, but he must go inside the tower to stop Lieselotte.

Entering Rinja Tower, {PC} and
Firo catch up with Lieselotte.
Firo tries to persuade
Lieselotte to stop summoning the demon, but Her listens to
Firo's words. 
The amber jewel in Lieselotte's hands contained a butterfly, but it was taken away to the Town of Celed for the demon summoning ritual.

Lieselotte succeeded in the demon summoning ritual.
Her was preaching the fruit of the children's kingdom, but
Lieselotte's true wish was for the adults of the town to return
again. .
However, Genie Enraja laughed at Her's wish and attacked
with his henchman Muccino.
Although he cooperated with Firo,
the {PC} lost the battle.

Lieselotte succeeded in the demon summoning ritual.
Her was preaching the fruit of the children's kingdom, but
Lieselotte's true wish was for the adults of the town to return
again. .
However, Genie Enraja laughed at Her's wish and attacked
with his henchman Muccino.
With the help of Firo, the {PC} won the battle.

Defeat Genie Enraja and Muccino.
Although the crisis in Town of Celed is over for the time being,
The children miss the adults.
Firo persuades the children to return to
the lives of the adults. I decided to go to Alltrades Abbey to pray.
Alltrades Abbey is located at the top of the mountain road from the north side of town.

Defeat Genie Enraja and Muccino.
Although the crisis in Town of Celed is over for the time being,
The children miss the adults.
Firo persuades the children to return
to the days when the adults were around. I decided to go to Alltrades Abbey to pray.
Alltrades Abbey is located at the top of the mountain road from the north side of town.

The children prayed at Alltrades Abbey, believing that the adults would return.
But no matter how long they waited, the adults still refused.
The children realized their situation. 
Lieselotte apologized to {PC} for everything that happened and gave her the Amber Jewel, saying that she would use her powers to survive.
We arrived at Arahagiro Kingdom.

While searching for the three butterflies, {PC} arrived at the
Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro.
According to King Bermud, the people of this kingdom have lost
any memory of their past.
King Bermud He asked me if I wanted to see some of this country's specialties and told me to come to the Monster Fisticuffs place north of the castle.

While searching for the three butterflies, {PC} arrived at the
Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro.
King Bermud says that the people of this kingdom have
no memory of their past.
King Bermud He asked me if I wanted to see some of this country's specialties and told me to come to the Monster Fisticuffs place north of the castle.

At the Monster Fisticuffs venue in the Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro,
King Bermud was about to put on a show where he would punish the monsters who lost in Monster Battle, but a girl named Se Rafui protested. The event has been canceled. 
Se Rafui has something to say about butterflies.
He asked the {PC} to come to 
Murudo Mountain in the west of the kingdom.

At the Monster Fisticuffs venue in the Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro,
King Bermud was about to put on a show where he would punish the monsters who lost in Monster Battle, but a girl named Se Rafui protested. The event has been canceled. 
Se Rafui has something to say about butterflies.
He asked the {PC} to come to 
Murudo Mountain in the west of the kingdom.

When I read the letters engraved on the tombstones at Murudo Mountain at the request of Se Rafui, I discovered that they were the partners of the demon user.
It turned out to be A at the demon tomb. 
There's something I want you to see, so come! 
Let's go to the Summit with Se Rafui.

Seeing the portrait of the great Demon Master, Rafu noticed that the Killer Bread Sir he had met before was wearing the same bracelet as him.
He was actually a Demon Master. I seem to have a feeling that this is the case.
Se Rafui asked me to meet Killer Bread Sir again
and I decided to go to Jyra Jungle, which is located in the north of the kingdom and west of the Defel Desert.

Arriving deep in the Jyra Jungle,
{PC} finds Killer Bread Sir with a cross-scarred
white fur.
Se Rafui calls Killer Bread Sir his former partner.
Clawde. If they learn about the existence of demon users, they might understand that monsters and humans can communicate with each other!'' Se Rafui said, and decided to return to the Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro.

Returning to the Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro, {PC} and Se Rafui learn that an event called Mackerel Ludess Match will be held soon.\nThey will have to fight monsters to the death.\n {PC} was asked by Se Rafu to come up with a way to stop the event, so let's go outside and go to the monster-only entrance on the east side of the castle wall!

At the side entrance for monsters, {PC} received an explanation from Se Rafu about the strategy to save the monsters trapped in the Fisticuffs field.\nIn front of the stairs leading to the basement of the Fisticuffs field. If you tell the soldier that you have captured Clawde, he will let you go to the cage in the basement. If you go in front of the cage, Rafui will do the rest and make the monsters escape.

The {PCs} invaded the Monster Fisticuffs area in front of Ori. Thanks to Se Rafui's strategy,
the monsters that had been imprisoned by Ori were successfully released.
The fact that they came here It seems that he has regained his past.
He wants to stop King Bermud.
Let's go to the elevator on the ground level where King Bermud is.

In the battle hall of the monster Fisticuffs field
From the conversation between Se Rafu and King Bermud
King Bermud was depicted on the relief
A great demon tamer who is seeking revenge.
The monsters It turned out that he had been oppressing the enemy.
They fought against King Belmud, who had transformed into a monster, in an attempt to eliminate those who would get in the way of their revenge, but the {PCs} lost.

{PC} defeated Sin King Bermud in the Battle Hall of Monster Fisticuffs.
Se Rafui tries to persuade Bermud, but suddenly a soldier from Gran Zedora Kingdom appears. 
Se Rafui told the {PC} that she was actually Miss Raimu,
and asked her to come to Murudo Mountain to tell her everything.

{PC} is at Murudo Mountain
Se Rafu tells him that Clawde's real identity is
A demon user named Kalevan.
In the Kingdom of Al-Ahagiro,
humans and monsters are swapped in the wake of war.
P I was told that the elephant had woken up.
Se Rafui gave the Papillon Bracelet to {PC} and set out on a journey with Clawde.
{PC} visited the Kingdom of Gran Zedora.

While heading to Gran Zedora Castle,
{PC} happened upon Mishua. Mishua
explained that she had a feeling that the
key to restoring her lost memories lied
within Gran Zedora Castle, then she
passed through the gate .

At the Hero's Altar in Gran Zedora Castle,
Mishua and {PC} met the so - called
''Hero Princess'', Princess Anlucia.
Surprised that she and Mishua looked like
twins, Princess Anlucia invited us all
to the throne room on the second floor to
talk more, before heading there herself.

In the throne room of the second floor of
Gran Zedora Castle, Mishua and us sought an
audience with Princess Anlucia. {PC} told
of the light of the Hero's Awakening they had seen,
but Princess Anlucia explained that the time hadn't
come yet. Princess Anlucia provided a room for us
in the eastern tower to rest.

On the way to the bedroom in the eastern
tower that Princess Anlucia provided for
us, we happened upon Mishua. As Mishua
picked up a book, a fragment of her memory
returned, although it was incomplete.
Mishua's attendant, Lord Dyme, accompanied
her as we went to our own bedroom.

While resting in the bedroom of the eastern
tower on the castle's third floor, Maid Erfi
appeared and told us of Princess Anlucia's
words: she wished for us to come to the
throne room to see her.

During Princess Anlucia's audience with Mishua and
us, she explained that it might have a good effect
on returning Mishua's memory if Mishua accompanied
her to defeat the giant Red Dragon and asked us to
be Mishua's bodyguards. The dragon appeared in the
south of Gran Zedora Territory, Rovos Highlands,
deep inside the place called Zedra Cave.

During Princess Anlucia's audience with Mishua and
us, she explained that it might have a good effect
on returning Mishua's memory if Mishua accompanied
her to defeat the giant Red Dragon and asked us to
be Mishua's bodyguards. The dragon appeared in the
south of Gran Zedora Territory, Rovos Highlands,
deep inside the place called Zedra Cave.

her to defeat the giant Red Dragon and asked us to
be Mishua's bodyguards. The dragon appeared in the
south of Gran Zedora Territory, Rovos Highlands,
deep inside the place called Zedra Cave.

Inside Zedra Cave, the giant Red Dragon appeared
and attacked Mishua, but an incredible light
protected her and made the monster flee. Princess
Anlucia's demeanor changed quickly, as she claimed
the light was of the Hero's Awakening and that 
Mishua was her missing half, before taking Mishua
back to the castle by force.

Mishua was taken back to the castle and imprisoned
in the western tower, to be used in the Hero's
Awakening Ceremony. Concerned for Mishua's safety,
Old Man Dyme entrusted an Old Silver Key to us.
West of the castle , at Reviewle Highway, stands a
cliff facing the sea; there - in Seabreeze Cave - the
secret passageway into the western tower
can be found.

While sneaking into the western tower's secret,
underground passage to rescue Mishua, we overheard
the Wizard Kirgyl and his subordinate talking.
It seems that Mishua was meant to be part of some
kind of experiment. Kirgyl and his subordinate 
left to prepare for the experiment.

After sneaking into the western tower to rescue
Mishua from her imprisonment, she asked me to help
restore her memories! Just then, Crows appeared
and used the 3 Butterflies' power to open a
door to the world of Mishua's memories. If I go
and break the seal, Mishua's memories should be
released!

To restore Mishua's memories, I arrived in a
mysterious world. From out of nowhere, Crows'
voice could be heard and told that the butterflies
would guide me to Mishua's sealed memories.

To restore Mishua's memories, I arrived in a
mysterious world. From out of nowhere, Crows'
voice could be heard and told that the butterflies
would guide me to Mishua's sealed memories.

While searching for Mishua's memories, I found the
Green Butterfly in the private room and recalled a
fragment of Mishua's memories: The young princess
had her brother, named Toma, read from the Hero's
Picture Book; Toma seems to be the Hero. They were
told the King was about to depart, just as the
memory faded and the Green Butterfly flew off
somewhere else.

While searching for Mishua's memories, I found the
Green Butterfly in the private room and recalled a
fragment of Mishua's memories: The young princess
had her brother, named Toma, read from the Hero's
Picture Book; Toma seems to be the Hero. They were
told the King was about to depart, just as the
memory faded and the Green Butterfly flew off
somewhere else.

While searching for Mishua's memories, I found the
Green Butterfly on the terrace and recalled a
fragment of Mishua's memories: The Young Princess
and Toma were seeing King Arios off. From the sky
a gargoyle attacked and Toma was injured protecting
the Princess. Toma collapsed, just as the memory
faded and the Green Butterfly flew off
somewhere else.

While searching for Mishua's memories, I found the
Green Butterfly on the shoulder of the Hooded Man.
He handed me a clue to Mishua's sealed memories,
the Hero Picture Book, and asked me to deliver it
the child who has yet to awaken!

I held up the Hero's Picture Book to the sleeping
girl and recalled a fragment of Mishua's memories:
her true name is Anlucia and she decided to become
the Ally to her brother, the Hero Toma, just as
the memory faded, the sleeping Anlucia aged and
Blue Butterfly flew off somewhere else.

While searching for Anlucia's memories, I found the
Blue Butterfly in the throne room and recalled a
fragment of Anlucia's memories: a minstrel troupe
was visiting the castle and its dancer, Janna,
performed a beautiful dance that greatly\ nentertained Anlucia. The troupe told of their
departure, just as the memory faded and the Blue
Butterfly flew off somewhere else.

While searching for Anlucia's memories, I found the
Blue Butterfly on the Hero's Altar and recalled a
fragment of Anlucia's memories: Anlucia prayed at
the Hero's Altar to become an ally to the Hero.
She and the dancer, Janna , told each other their
dreams. Janna told of a dream - granting
''Wish Flower'' and promised to send one, just as
the memory faded and the Blue Butterfly flew off
somewhere else.

While searching for Mishua's memories, I found the
Blue Butterfly on the shoulder of the Hooded Man.
He handed me a clue to Anlucia's sealed memories,
the Wish Flower, and asked me to deliver it
the child who has yet to awaken!

I held up the Wish Flower to the sleeping Anlucia
and recalled a fragment of Anlucia's memories:
while holding out the Wish Flower to Anlucia, Toma
reported on Janna's death. After picking herself
up, Anlucia promised to become strong enough to
never have to cry again! And Toma cheered her up.
Just as the memory faded, the sleeping Anlucia
aged and the Red Butterfly flew off somewhere else.

I found the Red Butterfly on the shoulder of the
Hooded Man, who asked that I defeat the guardian
of Anlucia's most haunting sealed memory! To free
free Anlucia, I must defeat the Statue of Despair!

I destroyed the Statue of Despair that
Anlucia, herself, had created to seal her memories.
The Hooded Man said, ``with this, Anlucia's
memories will be restored'' and we returned to
the sleeping Anlucia.

Mishua's memories were restored and she awakened
as the True Hero Princess, Anlucia. The True
Princess Anlucia wanted to confirm what her other
self's reasons were for wanting her.
But first, we had to get out of the castle via
the hidden door in the wall, she told us.

Before escaping the castle, Princess Anlucia and us
were ambushed by the false Princess Anlucia.
After failing to absorb the power from the True Hero,
false Princess Anlucia planned to use the forbidden
Creation Magic and left for a place called the
Creatorium. The way to the Creatorium appears to
be in the basement of Alltrades Abbey.

We entered the teleportal in the ritual hall of
Alltrades Abbey, to take down the false Anlucia
before she could use the Creation Vortex's magic
to steal the Hero's power. Princess Anlucia and
us reached Ethene Village. The false Princess 
Anlucia wasn't there, so we left the village
to search for her.

To prevent False Princess Anlucia from trying to
use the Creation Vortex's magic to steal the
Hero's power, Hero Princess Anlucia and us

White Crystal Claw by defeating Demonic Soldier
Gezra.
